I am seriously considering getting it after seeing stories like this:

If you dont know what the game is then google it. Its 12 at night and not bothered explaining :P
Anyway I just hoping to get an insight into if its worth 20 euro. Its only in alpha stages like.

title: Anyone here bought/played RUST?

replies.body: Le game is pretty good, I enjoy playing it with my friends ^_^
replies.body_tagged: Le game is pretty good, I enjoy playing it with my friends ^_^

replies.body:
I got it and 12 minutes into the game, 3 naked guys lured me into their hut and trapped me there. Then they decided to torture me by blasting the song Barbie Girl into their mics... I managed to escape though when they opened to door to finally kill me. I ran in the cold, dark woods being chased for like 10 minutes till I lost them. Then I decided I'd go for a swim in the water... and died the second I touched it wat.

Its a fantastic game everyone should get it!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: I play it and GET IT its awesome, I find that its an easier version of DayZ but its still great.
